name: 簡永彬
objective:
本課程為上學期「攝影美學與實踐講座」的進階課程。本學期將教導傳統底片攝影與數位攝影,多面向性及綜含媒材應用的影像處理訓練，透過傳統暗房的實練操作、體悟古典攝影轉印的美學,培養學生對影像品質的概念，及訓練學生對當代藝術攝影的展演、構成等, 自我的實踐。
 This course is a traditional film photography and digital photography, multi-directional and comprehensive image processing training in media applications. Through the practice of traditional darkrooms, the aesthetics of classical photographic transfer are cultivated, and students' concepts of image quality are cultivated. Students' self-practice on the performance and composition of contemporary art photography.
